data.actual_result: Device actually crashes after couple minutes or seconds
data.short_description: Device crashes when being role tagged in a announcement channel while reactions being added
data.steps_to_repro: - Have an older iDevice (iPhone 5s to SE, or iPad Air 1st to 2nd Gen. iOS version doesn't matter.)- Go to a channel in a server where there will be a role ping.- Have the server owner to ping the role, and ask the individuals in the role to react-spam as if there is no tomorrow. - Watch as your iOS client freezes. (If you crashed beforehand, then you don't need to do the remaining reproduction steps.)- When it does, click on the home button then go back into the app. If it doesn't crashes for the first time, try it again.
